discourse_list.title: [\xf0\x9f\x93\x84] Collateral Onboarding Call #23: xDAI / STAKE - Wednesday, January 13th 18:00 UTC

content.content: image_2021-01-04_19-55-341280×720 46.9 KB Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-01-13T18:00:00Z Dial In Details Zoom Call Passcode:  ONBOARD Intro Welcome to another collateral onboarding call, where we discuss potential assets for MCD and potential integrations for DAI’s supply and demand. Open for anyone to join. If you’d like to present, check out this thread. Agenda Intro by  @juanjuan xDai Team https://xdaichain.com/ by @igorbarinov & Andrew  xDai, what is it and its uses Samples of different projects on xDai [STAKE] MIP6 Collateral Onboarding Application Q&A  See you there! attn: @amyjung; @blimpa ; @overanalyser ; @Primoz ; @g_dip ; @akash ; @g_dip ; @flipflopflapdelegate ; @Planet_X; @Deimos ; @iammeeoh ; @nanexcool See you there!

Collateral Call Summary - Episode #23  January 13th, 2021 Agenda   00:00: Introduction with Juan Guillén ↓   00:47: xDai with Igor Barinov and Andrew Gross ↓   44:13: Special Guest Patricio Worthalter from Proof Of Attendance Protocol ↓  Q&A and Discussion about xDai was interspersed in the presentation ↓   01:10:28: Closing comment ↓   Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C1dbId69vJo Introduction Juan Guillén Agenda and Preamble 00:00  Welcome to another MakerDAO Collateral Call. Today we have the xDai team, a very interesting project. We also have Patricio from POAP, the Proof Of Attendance Protocol, joining as a special guest; he’s going to be describing his own project afterwards. Discussions about collateral happen in the Forum.   xDai  [STAKE] MIP6 Collateral Onboarding Application   Igor Barinov and Andrew Gross Presentation 00:47 Overview & history1920×1080 170 KB What is xDai1920×1080 234 KB  06:24 — Juan Guillén: Dai to xDai is not one-to-one, right?  Brief history1920×1080 193 KB Brief history1920×1080 207 KB Brief history1920×1080 192 KB Features and adoption1920×1080 169 KB Stable transactions1920×1080 201 KB Interoperability1920×1080 209 KB  13:54 — Question in chat: Even if gas is payed in Dai, which is stable, what prevents gas from increasing over time, so breaking the stable property of xDai? 16:56 — Correct me if I’m wrong, but I think xDai is like a sidechain which is PoS instead of PoW, so we have these validators and it’s cheaper to process these transactions. And I find it really cool that my address on Ethereum is the same address on xDai  Public POSDAO1920×1080 191 KB STAKE governance token1920×1080 211 KB  24:46 — Tim Black: Did we cover how much STAKE is needed to become a validator? 27:15 — Juan Guillén: Regarding the rewards, are the fees that are consumed distributed among validators? 30:23 — Payton Rose: I was curious about the cost for using the bridge between the two 35:20 — Question in chat: Will STAKERers eventually be able to get rewards from using the tokens […] ERC20 locked in the bridge for some extra profit?  Tools and project integrations1920×1080 184 KB Project integrations1920×1080 133 KB Current usage1920×1080 198 KB Resources1920×1080 123 KB Special Guest Patricio Worthalter 1920×1080 124 KB  58:43 — Free discussion 01:06:40 — Juan Guillén: L2 chains do settlements every couple of weeks or so. If a mint a POAP in xDai, am I supposed to receive it after two weeks on Ethereum?  Closing Comment Juan Guillén Outro 01:10:28  Patricio, how can people learn more about POAP and find you and follow you et cetera? (01:10:28) I actually wrote a tiny tutorial on how to create a POAP for your event; it’s on definotes.com — and yeah: it’s super straightforward. Let’s keep the discussion in the forum. Looking forward to see how this evolves. Thank you for joining us.  Credits   @blimpa produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call, listed in the headers.
This is exciting! I will try to attend! But to be sure, will the call be recorded and uploaded to YouTube or something? Thanks!
iammeeoh:  will the call be recorded and uploaded to YouTube   It will. Hope to see you (and everyone else) there with interesting questions.
Video recording for those interested: https://youtu.be/C1dbId69vJo
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
